Bulog Batal Impor Daging Sapi Brasil
01 Nov 2019, 06:40 by Vadhia Lidyana


Dirut Bulog Budi Waseso/Foto: Vadhia Lidyana/detikFinance

Jakarta - Perum Bulog tahun 2019 ini telah diberikan kuota mengimpor 30.000 ton daging sapi Brasil. Kuota tersebut diputuskan dalam rapat koordinasi terbatas (rakortas) dengan sejumlah kementerian/lembaga terkait saat Menteri Koordinator Perekonomian masih dipegang Darmin Nasution.Namun, Bulog batal mengimpor daging sapi Brasil tahun ini."Penugasan sudah ada tapi memang belum bisa dilaksanakan, karena waktunya sudah mepet. Perjalanannya 47 hari. Lama, jadi kita memutuskan untuk tidak impor. Yang jelas tahun ini nggak," tegas Direktur Utama (Dirut) Perum Bulog, Budi Waseso usai menghadiri acara Ngopi BUMN, di kantor Kementerian BUMN, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Menurutnya, stok daging dalam negeri mulai dari daging sapi lokal, daging sapi Australia, dan daging kerbau India sudah cukup. "Daging kerbau India sudah banyak, daging sapi Australia sudah banyak, daging lokalan banyak. Nanti malah mubazir dan kita kan harus menggenjot lokalan juga. Kan tadi saya menegaskan kalau impor diperlukan ya impor, kalau tidak ya tidak usah dulu," terang pria yang biasa dipanggil Buwas itu.Kemudian, ia juga menyebutkan bahwa stok daging sapi Brasil sebanyak 10.000 ton yang sudah diimpor PT Berdikari (Persero) juga sudah cukup memenuhi pasokan daging dalam negeri.Sebelumnya, Direktur Jenderal Perdagangan Luar Negeri Kemendag Indrasari Wisnu Wardhana mengatakan, jika Bulog batal impor daging sapi Brasil maka Bulog harus mengajukan rakortas ulang.Menanggapi hal tersebut, Buwas menuturkan bahwa pihaknya tak masalah jika harus rakortas ulang kembali menghitung kembali kebutuhan daging dalam negeri."Ya nggak apa-apa, kan demi kebaikan mau rakortas ulang 100 kali juga nggak apa-apa. Lebih baik tahun depan saja deh. Sambil menghitung kebutuhannya," terang BuwasSimak Video "Pak Budi Waseso, Minat Jadi Menteri?"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hns/hns)

Bulog Cancel Imports of Brazilian Beef
01 Nov 2019, 06:40 by Vadhia Lidyana


Managing Director of Bulog Budi Waseso / Photo: Vadhia Lidyana / detikFinance

Jakarta - The 2019 Bulog Corporation has been granted a quota of importing 30,000 tons of Brazilian beef. The quota was decided in a limited coordination meeting (rakortas) with a number of relevant ministries / institutions when the Coordinating Minister for the Economy was still held by Darmin Nasution. However, Bulog canceled importing Brazilian beef this year. "The journey took 47 days. It's long, so we decided not to import. What is clear is this year," said the Managing Director of the State Logistics Agency (Bulog), Budi Waseso after attending the BUMN Coffee Event, at the BUMN Ministry office, Jakarta, Friday (1/11) /2019).According to him, domestic meat stock ranging from local beef, Australian beef, and Indian buffalo meat is sufficient. "Indian buffalo meat is already abundant, Australian beef is plentiful, local meat is abundant. Later it will be wasteful and we will have to boost localization as well. As I said earlier, imports are needed, if not yes it is not necessary first," explained an ordinary man called the Buwas. Then, he also mentioned that the Brazilian beef stock of 10,000 tons that had been imported by PT Berdikari (Persero) was also sufficient to meet the domestic meat supply. Previously, the Director General of Foreign Trade of the Ministry of Trade Indrasari Wisnu Wardhana said, if Bulog was canceled Brazilian beef imports, Bulog must file a rakortas re-responding. Responding to this, Buwas said that it was no problem if they had to re-calculate the re-consumption of domestic meat. "Yes, it's OK, it's for the good to want to report 100 times too. anything.
